AUROC=0.7566548358473824	AUPRC=0.7249251134486049	Accuracy=0.7026315789473684	MCC=0.406150802132264	Recall=0.7806122448979592	Precision=0.6860986547085202	f1_score=0.7303102625298328

######NOTE#######
#According to help_documentation of sklearn.metrics.classification_report:in binary classification, recall of the positive class is also known as sensitivity; recall of the negative class is specificity#

              precision    recall  f1-score   support

     control       0.73      0.62      0.67       184
        case       0.69      0.78      0.73       196

   micro avg       0.70      0.70      0.70       380
   macro avg       0.71      0.70      0.70       380
weighted avg       0.71      0.70      0.70       380
